founders.name: Dr. Swatheeshwaran
founders.bio:
Dr. Swatheeshwaran is a dedicated Sports Physiotherapist with a vision to redefine how pain and performance are managed in Trichy. With a Master's degree in Sports Physiotherapy, he combines academic rigor with on-field practical experience. 

He has worked as an Assistant Professor for three years, training the next generation of physiotherapists while simultaneously managing high-performance athletes. His approach is deeply rooted in biomechanics—understanding how the body moves to fix how it feels.
founders.shortBio: Dr. Swatheeshwaran, MPT Sports, is the founder of ATREUS PHYSIO and a clinician who believes in science driven, movement centred rehabilitation. His practice focuses on helping people return to an active, confident and pain free life.
founders.experience: He has worked as an Assistant Professor for three years, trained institutional and professional athletes, and delivered rehabilitation for high performance sport environments. His on field experience includes serving as physiotherapist for multiple major national, state and inter university events.

items: All India Aquatics, Beach Volleyball, Badminton, Basketball Championships (2023-2024)
South Zone tournaments: Football, Volleyball, Tennis, Basketball (2021-2023)

founders.philosophy: I don't believe in 'fixing' patients. I believe in educating them, empowering them, and building their capacity so they don't need to come back. Rehabilitation shouldn't be a mystery; it should be a clear, progressive journey.

services.title: Pain Management
services.excerpt: Assessment first, movement correction, and progressive exercises to restore confidence.
services.description: Chronic pain isn't just about tissues; it's about the nervous system, movement habits, and lifestyle. We use a multi-modal approach to desensitize painful structures and build long-term resilience.
services.fullDescription: Pain is complex, often persisting long after tissues have healed. Our Pain Management program goes beyond temporary relief. We combine manual therapy to reduce immediate symptoms with graded exposure therapy and education to retrain your pain system. By addressing fear-avoidance behaviors and correcting maladaptive movement patterns, we help you regain control over your body.
benefits: Scientific explanation of your pain triggers
process: Detailed pain history and trigger analysis
Movement screen to identify guarding patterns

details.feels: Localised pain, stiffness, reduced movement or recurring flare ups.
details.expect: A clear explanation of why the pain is happening and a structured plan to reduce symptoms.
details.approach: Assessment first, movement correction, progressive exercises and load planning to restore confidence.

services.title: Sports Rehab
services.excerpt: Biomechanics based rehab, sport specific loading, and return to sport steps.
services.description: Athletes need more than just pain relief; they need performance restoration. Our sports rehab is data-driven, sport-specific, and focuses on optimizing biomechanics to prevent re-injury.
services.fullDescription: Whether you're a professional athlete or a weekend warrior, our Sports Rehab program bridges the gap between healthcare and performance. We analyze the specific demands of your sport and replicate them in the clinic. Using video analysis and force (load) management, we rebuild your capacity to sprint, jump, cut, and lift, ensuring you return to the field stronger than before.
process: Restoration of range of motion & activation

details.feels: Injury during training, reduced performance, difficulty returning to sport or repeated setbacks.
details.expect: A plan that matches the demands of your sport with clear return to sport steps.
details.approach: Biomechanics based rehab, sport specific loading, movement retraining and strength progressions.

services.title: Post Surgical Rehab
services.excerpt: Guided recovery with structured milestones and safe progression.
services.description: Surgery is just the first step. The rehabilitation that follows dictates your long-term outcome. We follow evidence-based protocols while tailoring progression to your specific healing rate.
services.fullDescription: Post-operative recovery matches the surgeon's skill with the therapist's guidance. We communicate directly with your surgeon to ensure protocol compliance while optimizing recovery. From initial swelling management and graft protection to regaining full function and strength, we are with you at every milestone.

details.feels: Weakness, restricted mobility, swelling or difficulty regaining function after surgery.
details.expect: Guided recovery with structured milestones and safe progression.
details.approach: Controlled mobility, gradual strengthening, gait and movement retraining, and long term function building.

services.title: Spine Care
services.excerpt: Movement analysis, spinal mechanics, targeted exercise and strength conditioning.
services.description: Back and neck pain are often driven by fear and stiffness. We demystify spine problems and build a robust, resilient back through movement and graded loading.
services.fullDescription: Most spine issues are mechanical in nature, accumulating from sustained postures or poor load management. We move away from passive treatments like traction and focus on active spinal rehabilitation. By improving core coordination, spinal mobility, and global strength, we build a 'buffer' against daily stressors.

details.feels: Neck pain, low back pain, radiating symptoms or stiffness.
details.expect: Understanding of triggers, relief strategies and long term movement confidence.
details.approach: Movement analysis, spinal mechanics, targeted exercise and strength conditioning.

services.title: Knee & Shoulder
services.excerpt: Joint loading strategies, mobility needs, strength profiling and functional progression.
services.description: The knee and shoulder are complex joints relying heavily on muscle function. We address the entire kinetic chain to offload the painful joint and restore smooth mechanics.
services.fullDescription: Knee and shoulder pain often result from issues elsewhere—weak hips affecting the knee, or poor thoracic mobility affecting the shoulder. We treat the joint but look at the whole body. Our approach involves isolating the weak link, strengthening it, and then integrating it back into complex movements.

details.feels: Pain with activity, instability, difficulty lifting, walking or playing sports.
details.expect: A joint specific plan that focuses on mechanics, stability and performance.
details.approach: Joint loading strategies, mobility needs, strength profiling and functional progression.

services.title: Performance Training
services.excerpt: Strength and conditioning, movement efficiency, load progression and performance metrics.
services.description: For those who are pain-free but want to move better, run faster, or lift heavier. We apply clinical biomechanics to sports performance.
services.fullDescription: Performance isn't just about effort; it's about efficiency. We analyze your technique to find energy leaks and potential injury risks. Our conditioning programs are scientifically periodized to peak you for your specific events, whether it's a marathon, a tournament, or simply life.

details.feels: Need for better strength, speed, endurance or sport specific performance.
details.expect: A tailored program designed to enhance capacity, skill and resilience.
details.approach: Strength and conditioning, movement efficiency, load progression and performance metrics.

services.title: Online Consultations
services.excerpt: Movement review through video, personalised exercise plan and load management advice.
services.description: Expert physiotherapy is no longer bound by geography. We provide comprehensive assessment and guided rehab globally through high-quality video consultations.
services.fullDescription: Many musculoskeletal issues can be effectively managed with the right advice and exercise program. Our online consultations involve a thorough history and video movement assessment. We then deliver a custom app-based exercise program with video demonstrations and provide continuous support via WhatsApp.
benefits: Access to expert care from anywhere

details.feels: Pain, movement issues or uncertainty without immediate access to a clinic.
details.expect: A complete online assessment with clear exercises, guidance and follow up support.
details.approach: Movement review through video, personalised exercise plan and load management advice.

conditions.title: Knee Pain
conditions.whatItIs: Pain arising from the joint, soft tissues or loading mechanics around the knee.
conditions.symptoms: Pain during walking, squatting, stairs or sport activities.
conditions.whenToSeekHelp: If pain limits daily activity or keeps recurring.

conditions.title: Back Pain
conditions.whatItIs: Pain from spinal joints, discs or soft tissue sensitivity influenced by load and movement.
conditions.symptoms: Stiffness, tightness, sharp episodes or discomfort with bending and lifting.
conditions.whenToSeekHelp: If pain affects work, sleep or daily function.

conditions.title: Neck Pain
conditions.whatItIs: Pain arising from cervical joints, muscles or load intolerance.
conditions.symptoms: Difficulty turning, tightness, headaches or radiating discomfort.
conditions.whenToSeekHelp: If symptoms persist or limit movement.

conditions.title: Shoulder Pain
conditions.whatItIs: Pain from rotator cuff tissues, joint structures or movement coordination issues.
conditions.symptoms: Pain during lifting, reaching, overhead tasks or sleep.

conditions.title: Ankle Injuries
conditions.whatItIs: Sprains or load related issues affecting ankle stability and movement control.
conditions.symptoms: Swelling, instability or pain during walking or sport.

conditions.title: Ligament Injuries
conditions.whatItIs: Injury to stabilising ligaments in joints like the knee or ankle.
conditions.symptoms: Instability, swelling or difficulty with weight bearing and sport.
conditions.whenToSeekHelp: If the joint feels unstable or recovery slows.

conditions.title: Muscle Strains
conditions.whatItIs: Injury to muscle fibres due to sudden effort or excessive load.
conditions.symptoms: Local pain, tightness, reduced strength or discomfort on stretch.
conditions.whenToSeekHelp: If pain limits movement or sport performance.

conditions.title: Sciatica
conditions.whatItIs: Radiating leg pain due to neural sensitivity or spinal mechanics.
conditions.symptoms: Leg pain, numbness, tingling or difficulty with prolonged standing or walking.
conditions.whenToSeekHelp: If symptoms persist or worsen over time.
